effect.@en: This Quality is conferred by the handiwork of guildmasters. Weapons of this Quality gain a +10 Base Chance to strike and a +2 Damage adjustment. Armor and shields with this Quality add a passive +2 to the Damage Threshold Modifier. Add 3 to the Patronage level required to obtain such items, if they are even available. In addition, they do not suffer Degradation from the Wheel.
